values.title: JRR Tolkien
values.desc: Not all those who wander are lost

values.title: St Augustine
values.desc: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page

values.title: Lao Tzu
values.desc: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step

values.title: Anita Desai
values.desc: Wherever you go becomes a part of you somehow

values.title: Lao Tzu
values.desc: A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving

values.title: Rumi JalaludDin
values.desc: Travel brings power and love back into your life

values.title: David Mitchell
values.desc: Travel far enough you meet yourself

values.title: Derek Walcott
values.desc: I read I travel I become
